issue.subject: Archive an order should delete files
issue.description: When you archive an order, files should not be deleted?

journals.notes:
No, the file should not be deleted.

-->"Archive" just mean that the request is tagged to be differentiated from "active" requests (see enhancement description #1216)
--> the file is deleted automatically according to the time of file retention defined in backend (cleanup order delay in SHOP parameters)
